summary: this mod comes nazeem remastered and more npc and new followers.
descriptionHtml: [font=Times New Roman][size=4]This mod comes with nazeem remastered which means a deadric war hammer, more uglier, at level 100,and can shout and finally with a full set of dragon plate amour. and i had added more NPC to the game but I'll add a lot more and i added two new followers one of them is named Alda he is a reguard with a full set of ebony amour and at level 100 Alda is located at dragons reach. the second follower is a demora named Deathlo he has a full set of deadric amour and is at level 100 he is located in the sleeping giant inn in riverwood. If you guys have any comments or suggestions please put them in the comment page.[/size][/font]
author: RicoalcallMods
